result.title: Report on the relationship between any component part of the RI that is outside the legal entity, and the legal entity
result.description: DANUBIUS-RI will comprise components which will have 2 legal positions: either part of the ERIC, or in close connection with the ERIC but maintaining the previous legal position (mainly in the case of existing components). In each case, detailed legal agreements must be developed to understand how all the elements will interact in harmony, ensuring the DANUBIUS-RI sustainability. The deliverable is due in Month 24.

result.title: Final report
result.description: Based on central coordination and continuous support this work package ultimately aims to enlarge DARIAH and for new membership in six new European countries and Israel. The final report will outline progress and – if formal membership will not have been established in some countries during the project lifetime – the next steps with regard to DARIAH accession in these countries.
